TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SmtpDeliveryMethod extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how email messages are delivered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the SmtpDeliveryMethod enumeration as a parameter to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the delivery method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod Network = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Email is sent through the network to an SMTP server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod PickupDirectoryFromIis = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Email is copied to the pickup directory used by a local Internet Information Services (IIS) for delivery.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod SpecifiedPickupDirectory = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Email is copied to the directory specified by the property for delivery by an external application.
